sentences.en: All through the faculty meeting Frank stood up for his friend who was being criticized so severely.
sentences.cn: 在全系大会上,法兰克始终维护受到严厉批判的朋友.

sentences.en: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
sentences.cn: 教师和学生都反对这些措施。

sentences.en: Faculty members complain that their students are unprepared to do college-level work.
sentences.cn: 学院的老师们抱怨说他们的学生还很不适应大学的课业。

sentences.en: For the faculty, there exists the triad of responsibilities: teaching, research, and service.
sentences.cn: 教员要承担三重责任：教学、研究与服务。

sentences.en: He has a good faculty of hearing.
He has the faculty for making friends.
He has the faculty of saying the right thing at the right time.
sentences.cn: 他有在恰当的时候说恰当的话的才智.

sentences.en: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
sentences.cn: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？

sentences.en: I had to keep my end up with other professors in the faculty.
sentences.cn: 我得和系里其他教授一起做好自己的本职工作。

sentences.en: It is also a myth that the faculty of hearing is greatly increased in blind people.
sentences.cn: 盲人的听力会大幅增强也是一种谬谈。

sentences.en: She had a great faculty for absorbing information.
sentences.cn: 她吸收信息的能力很强。

sentences.en: She subsequently became the Faculty's President.
She was Dean of the Science faculty at Sophia University.
sentences.cn: 她是上智大学科学院的院长。

sentences.en: So far as I know, she has a faculty of housekeeping.
sentences.cn: 就我所知, 她很善于理家.

sentences.en: Some students unburden themselves of emotional problems that faculty members feel ill equipped to handle.
sentences.cn: 一些学生倾诉了教师们无力解决的情感问题。

sentences.en: The Bush Foundation has funded a variety of faculty development programs.
sentences.cn: 布什基金会已经资助了许多教员发展项目。

phrases.tran_cn: 理学院；科学院；自然科学系
职员之一；（院校）系里的成员
（大学的）系；大学教授团；全体教员

trans.tran_cn: 官能，能力，院系，全体教师
trans.tran_en: a particular skill that someone has
